item.title: #498 please
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

My chat hooks broke, so you have to ask Ollie those 

Hooking Menu
  * getMenuOptionsCount() added to class client gets STATIC int j.P
  * isMenuOpen() added to class client gets STATIC boolean kj.j
  * getMenuY() added to class client gets STATIC int ai.ab
  * getMenuX() added to class client gets STATIC int wi.p


Hooking MenuStringWrapper
  * getMenuOptions() added to class client gets STATIC dc[] uc.h
  * getMenuActions() added to class client gets STATIC dc[] vd.N


Hooking ActionConstants
  * getActionID() added to class client gets STATIC short[] ph.Z
  * getActionCmd1() added to class client gets STATIC long[] qi.q
  * getActionCmd2() added to class client gets STATIC int[] gh.D
  * getActionCmd3() added to class client gets STATIC int[] rj.Y

Read full topic

item.title: #498 please
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:
@belbn wrote:

[quote=“qauters, post:2, topic:207463”][code]
Hooking Camera

  • getPlane() added to class client gets STATIC int lf.cb
  • getCamPosX() added to class client gets STATIC int ae.L
  • getCamPosY() added to class client gets STATIC int kj.h
  • getCamPosZ() added to class client gets STATIC int pc.v

Hooking CameraCurves

  • getCameraCurveY() added to class client gets STATIC int ie.Z
  • getCameraCurveX() added to class client gets STATIC int cb.i
    [/code][/quote]

Tanks mate
